<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Medusa's Scream](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3280)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 279 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=19)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The ghastly visage of a slain medusa's head stares out from this [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=19) (Hardness 13, HP 52, BT 26). The shield comes with a thick leather cover to conceal the head.

**Activate—Petrifying Gaze** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You reveal the medusa's face, focusing its gaze on one creature within 30 feet. The shield casts a DC 30 petrify spell with a range of 30 feet.

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the head of a medusa.

</column>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

A _greater medusa's scream_ (Hardness 15, HP 60, BT 30) has a frequency of once per hour for its activation instead of once per day, and the DC is 35.
